title: Brussels considers pan-EU police searches of ID photos
abstract: Law enforcement would seek matches with surveillance photos using facial recognition technology.

title: Sci-fi surveillance: Europe's secretive push into biometric technology
abstract: EU science funding is being spent on developing new tools for policing and security. But who decides how far we need to submit to artificial intelligence?

title: Leaked Reports Show EU Police Are Planning a Pan-European Network of Facial Recognition Databases
abstract: The proposal to link the EU’s facial recognition databases would likely connect them to the U.S. as well, in a massive consolidation of biometric data.

title: Swarms of Drones, Piloted by Artificial Intelligence, May Soon Patrol Europe’s Borders
abstract: The EU is funding the development of AI-powered drones that would autonomously patrol Europe’s borders. The project’s potential for military use can’t be ignored.

title: We Tested Europe’s New Lie Detector for Travelers — and Immediately Triggered a False Positive
abstract: 4.5 million euros have been pumped into the virtual policeman project meant to judge the honesty of travelers. An expert calls the technology “not credible.”

title: The EU is funding dystopian Artificial Intelligence projects
abstract: Despite its commitment to ‘trustworthy’ artificial intelligence, the EU is bankrolling AI projects that are questionable, write Fieke Jansen and Daniel Leufer.

title: Hard power: Europe’s military drift causes alarm
abstract: Critics are asking why, if the EU’s mission is to promote peace, it wants to use public money to fund the supply of weapons to foreign armies

title: L’Union européenne a discrètement fourni au Maroc de puissants systèmes de piratage des téléphones
abstract: Pour renforcer le contrôle des migrants, l’Union européenne a fourni à la police marocaine des logiciels d’extraction de données des téléphones. Faute de contrôle, ces technologies pourraient servir à accentuer la surveillance des journalistes et défenseurs des droits humains au Maroc.

title: Wie die EU Marokkos Überwachungsapparat aufrüstet
abstract: Die Regierung in Rabat verfolgt systematisch Journalisten und Oppositionelle. SPIEGEL-Recherchen zeigen, dass die EU dem Regime trotzdem Überwachungssoftware liefert – angeblich im Kampf gegen irreguläre Migration.

title: Prédire les flux migratoires grâce à l’intelligence artificielle, le pari risqué de l’Union européenne
abstract: Depuis plusieurs mois, l’Europe développe une intelligence artificielle censée prédire les flux migratoires afin d’améliorer l’accueil des migrants sur son sol. Or, selon plusieurs documents obtenus par Disclose, l’outil baptisé Itflows pourrait vite se transformer en une arme redoutable pour contrôler et harceler les personnes cherchant refuge en Europe.

title: Arming the EU — The long road towards a united defence
abstract: Europeans have woken up to a threat of war after several decades of peace and progress for most. This realisation, caused by Russia’s war against Ukraine, is about to fundamentally change the nature of the European Union.

title: Kitchen Appliance Maker Wants to Revolutionize Video Surveillance
abstract: A platform run by the Bosch-owned startup Azena has the potential to transform the surveillance camera industry. Experts worry it is ripe for abuse.
